editorialNotes.standard: Otter brings artificial intelligence to the human voice. Itâ€™s an automatic transcription app: Whether youâ€™re recording a voice note, a lecture, a business meeting, or a video conference, the app listens to whatâ€™s being said and automatically turns it into onscreen, searchable text. It also adds suggested keywords, which you can use to navigate through the recording when you play it back. You can use your deviceâ€™s own mic, your AirPods, or a Bluetooth microphone, and the app can also transcribe from previously recorded audio. As youâ€™d expect, the better quality the audio, the better results youâ€™ll get.
